companies.title: Real Skills, Real Evaluation, Real Talent
companies.desc: Replace CVs and interviews with real challenges and AI video analysis. Verify skills authentically, hire confidently.

candidates.title: Prove Your Skills, Land The Job
candidates.desc: Don't get filtered by an algorithm. Show what you can actually do through real-world challenges and get hired by top tech companies.

HowItWorks.title: How it works
HowItWorks.step1Desc: Create real-world problems that reflect actual job requirements.
HowItWorks.step2Desc: Candidates solve challenges and record video explanations of their approach.
HowItWorks.step3Desc: AI analyzes code quality, video explanations, and problem-solving approach.

Future.title: The future of hiring
Future.desc: Whether you're looking for talent, showcasing skills, or creating challenges. This is the future of hiring.

challengers.title: For Challengers
points: Get scouted by top tech firms

FooterCTA.title: Let AI help you with your career

About.headerTitle: Where enterprise AI meets real-world purpose
About.headerDesc: SkillMatch builds the new way to hire with AI solutions that help teams turn hiring effort into extraordinary impact

Mission.title: OUR MISSION
Mission.p1: Our mission is to transform hiring into a continuous learning journey where real skills matter more than résumés. We empower individuals to prove their abilities through practical challenges, meaningful feedback, and AI-verified understanding—so every effort becomes portfolio-worthy.
Mission.p2: Whether or not a hire happens. By combining real-world tasks, video-based explanation analysis, and personalized AI coaching, we create a fairer, more transparent system that rewards genuine capability.

Goal.title: OUR GOAL

Goal.p1: Our mission is to transform hiring into a continuous learning journey where real skills matter more than résumés. We empower individuals to prove their abilities through practical challenges, meaningful feedback, and AI-verified understanding—so every effort becomes portfolio-worthy.
